name: DomizilPlus Trust Office
goal: DomizilPlus is the independent trust office managed by its partners. It offers a wide range of services focusing on establishment and administration of companies.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Policies related to AML, tax, transparency in corporate matters and regulating financial services.
